storyInfo: Bagpipe, having gone through an arduous ordeal and left Victoria, realizes she needs to try and find some help. The one who immediately comes to her mind is Ch'en, currently in Lungmen.

attributes.content: 11:41 P.M. \ Overcast
Lungmen District 7, City Gateway
Inspector Hoshiguma, you're finally here!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Hey, you sent me a message to get out here right when I was taking my shoes off, kid. Had to scramble across half of Lungmen in the dead of night.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: —So, what's with your perp?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Ahem, we, we apprehended her! She's in a holding cell for now.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: So you got her? How many did it take?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Er, it was just me and another guy on duty...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: You said she's a Victorian soldier... packing a pretty intimidating weapon too.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I don't get it either...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Before me and Ping even got close, she just dropped her weapon, stuck her hands way up and started yelling 'right here,' like she was worried we couldn't even see her.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Inspector, I've been on this gateway for a couple years now. I've never seen someone try to cross in like this.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: No worries, I'll go see what her deal is.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Oh, right, you said in the message she was yelling something too?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: She's out there trying to speak mandarin Yanese, and not too well at that... but it sounded like she was saying, uh, Ch'en... Ch'en?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: I might've just heard it wrong.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Ah... ha.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Alright, I'm up to speed.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Uwagh, that's bright—oh, did someone finally come?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Yeah, I've got a few questions to ask.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Is this... an interrogation?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Counts as one, I guess.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: *sigh* It was always me doin' the interrogatin' before. Suddenly the tables are all turned. Honestly, it's a new feelin' to me.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: So you handed in your weapon all nicely... Didn't want to run?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Ought to be a fair deal simple gettin' out of here, really... even without the Fortcracker...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* No, not that I mean to! Clean forgot you're interrogatin' me... um, I've got no thoughts of runnin' at all! I kept here voluntarily!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Why? Hard to meet anyone who likes squatting in prisons.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I mean, I don't really want to be shut up. Just, I heard if I barged my way in the gate, police'd come arrest me... they're called the L.G.D. in Lungmen, right?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I was lookin' for someone, so, quickest method possible.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Find who, exactly?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Chenchen... I mean, right, Ch'en. She's in the L.G.D., right? I think she's already a... superintendent?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Ugh, what a shame. I thought she'd come over herself once she got the news, see.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: What relationship do you and this supposed Superintendent Ch'en have?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: We're best friends. We were classmates, back when she was at school in Victoria.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Which school?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Er, the Royal Guard Academy.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: In that case, you're an officer?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: ...I was before I left.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: A retired Victorian officer, in uniform, gatecrashing a border city of another nation, with a standard weapon to boot—
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Minus the bit where it fires shells! That part's removed!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: But with the chambering system retained, it still has massive blast force. Am I right?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: (Quietly) Goin' by the rulebook, I really should've handed it in to the brass...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Which is to say, you didn't have an ordinary retirement?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Well, that question came fast.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Ugh, if I knew this day was comin', I would've tried a little harder back in interrogation theory.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Are you that keen on covering up the details of your retirement? Miss, if you're a deserter, then I should be on the phone already.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: No, please don't call anyone—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I—I really am out of the force, I can promise you that!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I'll try and explain, but—there's some info I just... am not at liberty to reveal here.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Go for it, then.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Alright, here's the thing. Three months ago, I was still in the army, and our team was trackin' this case.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Durin' our investigation... um...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I can't say anythin' but, because of this case, out of our team, the only one presently still alive... no, still able to freely operate is me, now.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I'm sorry. It must be rough to remember.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Thank you for understandin'.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: That said, I'm not clear on something. You almost gave your life, so shouldn't the old Victorian Army fogies have been covering you in medals?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You mean, gettin' decorated? Forget it, the investigation's not complete. That never even crossed my mind.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: But at the very least... I thought they could send a few more hands to help me stay on the trail.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: And they didn't?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Really floors you, doesn't it? Officer, I make less sense of it than you do.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I started out searchin' for all kinds. Started from County Peninsula's barracks, and all of them were trippin' to placate me, havin' me wait for orders from above, pledgin' I'd have more hands ASAP.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: And I heeded that. In the end, I realized I was just wastin' more and more time, and the investigation was dead in its tracks for it. So, I decided to circumvent the place's barracks, and get straight in touch with Londinium.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Wasn't too easy doin' it, but luckily I'd already built up a little experience on how to deal with barracks, and you'll always run into good people on the way forward.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Finally, I made it in one piece to the closest camp to Londinium—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: And there, I made my decision to retire.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Because they still didn't help you?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Commanders, counts, the grand dukes... they probably had other concerns. They told me so, at least, and there I was swallowin' it all, right until the day...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I accidentally overheard. A lieutenant colonel with some other officer I didn't recognize, discussin' what to do with me.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Aye. I never thought—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Thirty-seven whole days past the event, and I wasn't sittin' waitin' for any reinforcements. Only an order to transfer.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: This can't have been easy for you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Mm... I feel a right mess inside. Is it hurt? Or disappointment, or anger... I can't even say.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: When I learned, my brain just went pure white. Only thought I could keep was I was glad I left my spear in the trainin' room, and didn't have it to hand.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Otherwise, you would've done something?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Wouldn't have, really... probably. After all, I've always remembered my own duty.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: And just the same, as a Victorian serviceman, I had to obey orders.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: But... in that moment, I realized I couldn't do it.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Armies don't much care for insubordination.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Aye. And with that, I settled on it pretty quickly. I'd leave the army myself before they decided where I ought to go.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Did they agree to let you go?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Retirement procedures went smooth enough. Leader and Chenchen used to complain how stubborn I was. Of course a lieutenant colonel and his lot couldn't do a thing to stop it.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: But, when I was at the camp to hand my weapons back in, I got ambushed.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: A surprise attack? From who? The one you were after?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It's very likely.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I've gone over it in my head. Why would they choose to act at the barracks, when they clearly didn't care for a whole month about me...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Maybe the enemy sneaked their way into army admin, in the end? Or maybe just from the start...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Ugh, none of it matters anymore.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I fought a few off, but they had masses of people. Couldn't help but pick up my spear and hurry on my way out.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: And then? That's how you fled Victoria?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Fled's... not wrong. Haha. It's been real rough and tumble comin' all this way.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I know how tall an order it is to deal with those bunch. Didn't dare go home, naturally. Didn't want the ghosts gettin' my mum and them caught up too.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Goin' back to the army's even more out of the question, and I'd just be hasslin' the police if I went to them. Kept waverin', thinkin' for an answer...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You could only turn to classmates?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Mm, that's right. Chenchen promised, if anythin' happened to me, I could go find her!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Ha ha.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Er, officer, what are you laughin' at?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: It's nothing. So, you came to Lungmen.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: That's where she is for certain. I haven't got it wrong, have I? Her New Year message last year came from this place and all.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Let's keep talking about why you broke past our gateway.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: No matter if you've got people hunting you down, you're a Victorian citizen anyway. You're not telling me you can't even buy a ticket somewhere?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: ...I honestly can't.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Huh? Professional Victorian servicemen take home less than Lungmen street stalls?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Err, that's not it.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I, um... lost my wallet and passport both in Leithanien.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You might be my kinda girl, huh...?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: —They got blown to nothin'. Not even cinders left.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You're definitely my kinda girl.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Not just the wallet, I was a hair from bein' sent flyin' too.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I'd only just left Victoria at that point. Rubbed shoulders with a caravan car crossin' Leithanien.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Hadn't been in the country for two days when the car passed this wee city. The local viscount was a fair deal happy to welcome us, and even set us up in the nicest inn and all.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: When it came evenin', the others went to this meal, and I stayed by myself in this whole luxury suite they gave me. Waiter gave me a supper meal, totally complimentary.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I had a few bites. Always felt Leithanian food was too refined for me, never much suited my palate. Just wanted to go outside and find a farmer's market to saunter about for a while.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Didn't think as soon I was downstairs, there'd be a boom, and the window frame for my room'd go crunch right in front of me. Completely mangled up, too.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: That's an intense explosion for sure.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It was! Even I might've lost my life if I got blown out a window ten floors up, y'know?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: ...Only might've?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It's serious, look, I swear! Honestly didn't expect to be so in for it even in Leithanien.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Hm. Your mind and body both seem much sturdier than that poor window frame.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Eh? Thanks... for the praise?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Come to mention it, do you know who tried to blow you up?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: No idea. I'd only been with the caravan for a few days, pitchin' in my strength. Shouldn't have made any enemies, right?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Actually... I'm not that worried about gettin' an answer to that question.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Ever since I started investigatin' this case, the riddles have piled on up, and there's been no moment of clarity at any point. Gotten used to it already.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: So, by coming to Lungmen, you were hoping to lean on your friend?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Oh, I'm not lookin' for others to protect me, no. I just wanted to ask Chenchen if she'd be willin' to help me.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Oh? You still want to go back to Victoria to finish the job? Even with so many people out for you?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Right you are.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Not a single hint of hesitation, either.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: (Exhale—)
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: It's been a few months for me, goin' from Victoria to Lungmen. Suppose I had even the slightest hesitation, I couldn't have gone this way.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I promised, I'd get the truth of it all out for all to see.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: If I don't know where that truth is, I'll go lookin'—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: If the enemy don't want me talkin', then I swear I'll talk.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I left Victoria without lookin' back. But if I'm all readied to return one day, then I will not waver one step.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You're not scared?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Right. I believe you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Warriors who keep saying they're not scared of dying are either bluffing, or they haven't gotten it yet.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I think you've made the preparations you need to, and I believe you aren't lying.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: So, in that case, can you help me get in touch with Che... Superintendent Ch'en?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Here, there's a few cha siu baau in this bag. They're pretty much cooled. If you can put up with that, they're edible. I'm guessing you're starved after running all this way through the wasteland?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Even a Vouivre as intrepid as you's gotta have her mealtimes.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Mmffm...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: ...so tasty...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Er, wait, is this part of the interrogation too?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Part of it? It ended a while ago.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I was thinkin' you'd ask me some about me and Chenchen's past, check if I was lyin' or not...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: No need.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What I needed to know, I long since knew.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You mean...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Um, wait, wait. It just came to me. I know you too. You're the L.G.D.'s Hoshi... Hoshi...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Hoshi... hoshi? Ha ha, you'd be better off not calling me that. Especially not in front of them.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: How about this, Bagpipe. We'll stick to code, and you stay in this room just a little longer. I'll step out for a moment to see someone.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Finished grilling?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Why not go in yourself, curious as you are?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Is there anything worth the curiosity?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Rhodes Island's people are all on their way. She can't stay here for long.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: If I've kept track of the time right, they should be here now.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hmph, that puk gaai Lung. Who knows where she's frolicking about right now while we're left working overtime.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: If Ch'en heard her old classmate walked a million miles looking for her, she'd be at least a little ruffled.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: She won't say it, but she's always been loyal to her friends, Missy, and you know that.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What do her friends matter to me?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: And you, you absolutely sent a message to Rhodes Island the moment you got the tip-off. Why the effort to interrogate her too? Do you love it, playing the bad cop?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Best to go through proper procedures, what with all the kids on the force watching.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Besides, don't you wanna do a little finding out, see what new dangers old Ch'en might get into?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: ...No thank you.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Ugh, I'm so done with this! Once Rhodes Island picks her up from in there, you're giving me a clear, thorough report... No slacking!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Ha ha, alright.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Look, here's the Rhodes Island operator to lead her away—
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Ehhhhh, what?!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: So Chenchen's actually left the L.G.D. already? You're telling me I need to go somewhere else now?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Er, what was that company called...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: —Rhooodes—Island?
attributes.name: Bagpipe
